title: Otherworldly Memorial ~ I Thought It Was an RPG, but It Turned Out to Be a Gal Game World, but I’m Going to Play Many Rounds and Try to Capture All the Characters! ～ - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Harem   Mystery   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Academy   Childhood Friends   Galge   Game Elements   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Polygamy   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Ugly Protagonist   Ugly to Beautiful   Younger Sisters
author: Grayage   暮影司
description:
The protagonist, a video game fanatic who spent his junior high and high school years at an all-boys school, is reincarnated in a different world that looks a bit like a nostalgic nurturing gal game! The heroines in the game are unbelievably cute. But unlike games where you can just press commands, you really have to work hard to raise your status. This is a romantic comedy that combines various galge elements into a strange otherworldly love simulation.

>
